page.title: 03BISHOP AUCKLAND - Summary
page.content: The town is{mainly residential,}with very little industry. The market end of the town is currently being pedestrianised. The prevailing economic climate is reflected by the number of empty shops and the lack of new businesses. Bishop Auckland is surrounded by a number of{semi-derelict mining {villages}which are gradually being {demolished}or{redeveloped.}Even some of the redeveloped sites on which factories were built in recent years are already being redeveloped themselves as the{factories}have closed and fallen into disuse. Rapid new{housing development}is taking place along the south-western perimeter of the town, although children from the{new estates}must come to{schools}situated in the southern quadrant of the town.
